law.catch_line: Subject to § 2-1246 of the State Government Article, on or before February 1 of each year the Commi...
law.text: Subject to § 2-1246 of the State Government Article, on or before February 1 of each year the Commission shall report to the General Assembly on the status of implementation of this subtitle, including the availability of Tier 1 renewable sources, projects supported by the Fund, and other pertinent information.
